omega_u.en: width of the upper half of a (1-α)% confidence interval for ω.

omega_l.en: width of the lower half of a (1-α)% confidence interval for ω.

omit.en: Optional variable used to hide or ignore aliquots. Aliquots marked as (lowercase) '<tt>x</tt>' are plotted (except on KDEs and CADs) but ignored for numerical analysis; Aliquots marked as (uppercase) '<tt>X</tt>' are removed from both plots and calculations.
omit.cn: 用来隐藏或者忽略等分 (aliquots) 的可选变量。标注为（小写）'<tt>x</tt>'的等分进行投图（除了KDE和CAD图）但是不进行数值分析；标注为（大写）'<tt>X</tt>'的等分被从投图和计算中剔除。

C.en: Optional variable to be used as fill colours in isochron and radial plots.
C.cn: 用来填充等时线和星状图的可选变量。

12sigma.en: (12σ%)
12sigma.cn: (12σ%)
